markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Entertainer](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=421)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

Through an education in the arts or sheer dogged practice, you learned to entertain crowds. You might have been an actor, a dancer, a musician, a street magician, or any other sort of performer.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) skill, and the [Theater Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Fascinating Performance](/Feats.aspx?ID=781) skill feat.
name: Entertainer

text: Entertainer Source Player Core pg. 86 2.0 Through an education in the arts or sheer dogged practice, you learned to entertain crowds. You might have been an actor, a dancer, a musician, a street magician, or any other sort of performer. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Performance skill, and the Theater Lore skill. You gain the Fascinating Performance skill feat.
